tool_description:
## Get started for FREE -  click☝️

Use GPT-4 and Claude-2 to extract: article summary, sentiment scores, call to action and important keywords from a URL. Place your finger on the pulse of sentiment shifts and rising trends for any niche, market, sector or topic by processing all relevant news articles and blog posts for that space using Sentilink.
name: Sentilink
title: Sentilink

api_list.name: Summarize
api_list.description:
(Give it 20-60s for a response)
This is the core endpoint where a URL and other parameters are sent as a POST request for processing.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentilink1.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentilink1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sentilink1.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentilink1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
